means: 腐败（堕落）地，可被收买的

sentence.Network_en: Ah sinful nation a people a seed of evil - doers, children that deal corruptly!
sentence.Network_cn: 这作恶犯罪的国家,这邪恶败坏的人民, 你们要遭殃了!

sentence.Network_en: Alas , sinful nation, People weighed down with iniquity, Offspring of evildoers, Sons who act corruptly!
sentence.Network_cn: 犯罪的国民, 担着罪孽的百姓,行恶的种类, 败坏的儿女.

PerfectNetExp.abs: corruptive 使堕落的corruptly 腐败地corruptness 堕落

entry.tran: 腐败的;贪污的;受贿的;营私舞弊的
entry.def: Someone who is corrupt behaves in a way that is morally wrong, especially by doing dishonest or illegal things in return for money or power.

example.ex: ...to save the nation from corrupt politicians of both parties...
example.tran: 从两个政党的腐败政客手中挽救这个国家

entry.def: If someone is corrupted by something, it causes them to become dishonest and unjust and unable to be trusted.

example.ex: It is sad to see a man so corrupted by the desire for money and power.
example.tran: 看到一个人因为追逐金钱和权力而如此腐化真是悲哀。

entry.def: To corrupt someone means to cause them to stop caring about moral standards.

example.ex: ...warning that television will corrupt us all...
example.tran: 警告说电视将会使我们所有人堕落
残暴行为会使人堕落、道德败坏。

entry.def: If something is corrupted, it becomes damaged or spoiled in some way.

example.ex: Some of the finer typefaces are corrupted by cheap, popular computer printers...
example.tran: 有些比较优美的字体经过价廉、通用的电脑打印机处理后就面目全非了。

example.ex: They can ensure that traditional cuisines are not totally corrupted by commercial practices.
example.tran: 他们可以确保传统烹饪不会被商业运营模式完全破坏。

auth_sentence.content: In part, it is because the laws that the colonists violated were seen as arbitrary, imposed from afar, and prosecuted corruptly.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In part, it is because the laws that the colonists violated were seen as arbitrary, imposed from afar, and prosecuted corruptly.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr Egretier, who is now a Paris university lecturer and bank employee, denies that he acted corruptly.
